name: TBTE - The Button Tycoon Experience
description:
Welcome to The Button Tycoon Experience!



The goal of this game is really simple! You play has UFXOID a simple robot that is stuck in a simulation where he need to punch a big button to make coins fall, by hoping to find a way out of this experiment.

Strange isn't it?


When coins have fall, you will have to run to get them. With money you collect you can spend them in a store to improve your character's appearance, stats and even the world of this game!

Everything you do in this game will be recorded in an online board to compare your score with the rest of the world!

FEATURE:
  • SHOP MARKET
  • FIGHT
  • ONLINE LEADERBOARD
  • PLAYER CUSTOMIZATION
  • PARKOUR
  • RACE
  • AND MORE!


Don't forget that the game is still in EARLY ACCESS mode and that there may be some things missing in the game and future updates will bring more things in this game! You can give your idea on our DISCORD page for future updates.
my DISCORD server: https://discord.gg/aCA5f5AvHe
